description.value:
With a horn atop your brow, magic comes intuitively to you. You may cast mage hand and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{Light} as arcane innate spells at will. The target of your @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{Light} spell must be your own horn. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.

Ability Boosts Constitution, Intelligence, Free

Ability Flaw Dexterity
